<form action="">
<input type="text" name="test">
</form>
</html>
----
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2 Final//EN">
<html>
<form action="">
<input type="text" name="test" value="whatever">
</form>
</html>
----
defaults={'test': 'whatever'}
